titleStmt.title: Popish plots and treasons from the beginning of the reign of Queen Elizabeth. / Illustrated with emblems and explain'd in verse. ; first are describ'd the cursed plots they laid. And on the side their wretched ends display'd.
titleStmt.author: G. C.
Danckertsz., Corn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by John Garret at his shop, at the Exchange-Staires in Cornhill ...,

notesStmt.note: "A thankfvll remembrance of Gods mercie by G.C."
